<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;RawError&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a573bcbbea76b4d72b33de1e392cc14aea8c4fdeb9f0256322a364cd1347a6ffd6">raw&#95;error&#95;code::corrupt&#95;file</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MSF superblock is missing&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msf/#a06fa30876215b96491f3bb001755c3fa">msf::validateSuperBlock</a>(&#42;SB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Buffer-&gt;getLength() % SB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/superblock/#a4792a3763eaca59db556d1c9305741cd">BlockSize</a> != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9999bd897fc8a1648bd69b36fee2d357">make&#95;error&lt;RawError&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a573bcbbea76b4d72b33de1e392cc14aea8c4fdeb9f0256322a364cd1347a6ffd6">raw&#95;error&#95;code::corrupt&#95;file</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;File size is not a multiple of block size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ContainerLayout.SB = SB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize Free Page Map.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ContainerLayout.FreePageMap.resize(SB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msf/superblock/#a1426565e730f0681edc1bfec6d59c5d5">NumBlocks</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The Fpm exists either at block 1 or block 2 of the MSF.  However, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allows for a maximum of getBlockSize() &#42; 8 blocks bits in the Fpm, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// thusly an equal number of total blocks in the file.  For a block size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of 4KiB (very common), this would yield 32KiB total blocks in file, for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maximum file size of 32KiB &#42; 4KiB = 128MiB.  Obviously this won&#39;t do, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the Fpm is split across the file at &#96;getBlockSize()&#96; intervals.  As a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result, every block whose index is of the form |&#123;1,2&#125; + getBlockSize() &#42; k|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for any non-negative integer k is an Fpm block.  In theory, we only really</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to reserve blocks of the form |&#123;1,2&#125; + getBlockSize() &#42; 8 &#42; k|, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current versions of the MSF format already expect the Fpm to be arranged</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at getBlockSize() intervals, so we have to be compatible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See the function fpmPn() for more information:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://github.com/Microsoft/microsoft-pdb/blob/master/PDB/msf/msf.cpp#L489</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FpmStream =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/mappedblockstream/#aca02a882851c4f44d12552f22d5fb9d7">MappedBlockStream::createFpmStream</a>(ContainerLayout, &#42;Buffer, Allocator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader">BinaryStreamReader</a> FpmReader(&#42;FpmStream);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> FpmBytes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = FpmReader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#a2d56063bcd6039c9372e485e609cf692">readBytes</a>(FpmBytes, FpmReader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#a81b49f753bf7db44da6cf4b0fc59b76e">bytesRemaining</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t BlocksRemaining = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#a6717efb2ed642a2e4529323bf0a00923">getBlockCount</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t BI = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a9cf141c9194799e2fa2d92de4c6e8ff0aa245c3230debe5c956484ecc6fa93877">Byte</a> : FpmBytes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t BlocksThisByte = std::min(BlocksRemaining, 8U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; BlocksThisByte; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a9cf141c9194799e2fa2d92de4c6e8ff0aa245c3230debe5c956484ecc6fa93877">Byte</a> &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ContainerLayout.FreePageMap&#91;BI&#93; = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">      --BlocksRemaining;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++BI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Reader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#ab56b001a0bd245c9e73972be0ac5d593">setOffset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#aa6c7f80408da2dff754296f55df4814a">getBlockMapOffset</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = Reader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#ab88a8b3835c1028f8fd6c2b23f396d30">readArray</a>(ContainerLayout.DirectoryBlocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/pdbfile/#a084eaf38d8941436a93d70e5bb7e66b5">getNumDirectoryBlocks</a>()))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t NumStreams = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Normally you can&#39;t use a MappedBlockStream without having fully parsed the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PDB file, because it accesses the directory and various other things, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is exactly what we are attempting to parse.  By specifying a custom</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subclass of IPDBStreamData which only accesses the fields that have already</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For convenience, we store the block array contiguously.  This is because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if someone calls setStreamMap(), it is more convenient to be able to call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it with an ArrayRef instead of setting up a StreamRef.  Since the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DirectoryStream is cached in the class and thus lives for the life of the</span></CodeLine>
